user_question: What are the most innovative stage designs in modern theater, and can you generate an image of one?
final_answer: Some of the most innovative stage designs in modern theater include the rotating stage of 'Hamilton' and the immersive set of 'The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time'. An image of a futuristic, abstract stage design has been generated.
